name: SnapshotBlendingModes
shortdesc: Modes that control which nearby snapshots, by size and shape, are blended into the new layout.

property.name: IGNORE_LAYOUT_SNAPSHOTS
property.shortdesc: Turns off the influence of layout snapshots completely.

property.name: USE_NEAREST_SNAPSHOT
property.shortdesc: Use the layout snapshot nearest in size and shape to the new layout.

property.name: LIMITED_SNAPSHOT_BLENDING
property.shortdesc: Use only layout snapshots within the same class as the new layout.

property.name: FULL_SNAPSHOT_BLENDING
property.shortdesc: Use up to three nearest snapshots even if a snapshot is in a different class that the new layout.
